.pum-title {
  background: 0 0;

  bottom: auto;
  clear: none;

.pum-overlay {
  height: 100%;
  width: 100%;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  z-index: 1999999999;
  overflow: initial;
  display: flex;
  transition: 0.15s ease-in-out;
}
.pum-overlay.pum-form-submission-detected,
.pum-overlay.pum-preview {
  display: block;
}
.pum-overlay,
.pum-overlay *,
.pum-overlay :after,
.pum-overlay :before,
.pum-overlay:after,
.pum-overlay:before {
  box-sizing: border-box;
}
.pum-container {
  top: 100px;
  position: absolute;
  margin-bottom: 3em;
  z-index: 1999999999;
}
.pum-container.pum-responsive {
  left: 50%;
  margin-left: -47.5%;
  width: 95%;
  height: auto;
  overflow: visible;
}

  max-width: 100%;
  height: auto;

.pum-alignment-right {

.pum-form--alignment-center {
